company_name: BHT BURGER HUB- UND TRANSPORTMITTEL GMBH

information: The company BHT BURGER HUB- UND TRANSPORTMITTEL GMBH, is a Wholesaler, founded in 1974, which operates in the Agriculture and forestry - machinery and equipment industry. It also operates in the Gardening and horticulture - machinery and equipment, Building materials, manufacture - machinery and equipment, Construction site installations and equipment, and Drilling and test boring - equipment industries. It is based in Herborn, Germany.
